product_name: The North Face Jammu Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Jammu jacket breathes like a soft shell and provides the waterproof protection of a hard shell. Polartec(R) NeoShell(R) stretch fabric has taped seams to keep the rain out. Zip handwarmer pockets, waterproof zip chest pocket. Rip-and-stick closures at cuffs. The North Face Jammu jacket has an adjustable, helmet-compatible hood. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Jammu jacket breathes like a soft shell and provides the waterproof protection of a hard shell.
